test_id: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 12 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f31b756b52153608ea01
test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 12 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f31b756b52153608ea01

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F4_Madhuri_SSC_13.03.2023_D1.png" style="width: 357px; height: 62px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a pattern of rotation and addition of elements. Each subsequent figure rotates 90 degrees clockwise and adds a new element. Option 2 matches this transformation.

hindi.explanation: शृंखला में चित्रित आकृतियों का अनुक्रम घूर्णन या तत्वों के जोड़े/हटाने पर आधारित होता है। इस मामले में, पहले तीन आकृतियों के बीच एक स्पष्ट पैटर्न दिखाई देता है जो चौथे विकल्प के साथ जारी रहता है।

options.value: Only conclusions I and III follow.
Only conclusions II and III follow.
Only conclusions I and II follow.

english.explanation: All three conclusions logically follow from the given statements. Conclusion I is valid because some bananas (from the second statement) are apples (from the first statement), making some fruits (from the third statement) apples. Conclusion II is valid as some oranges are bananas and all oranges are apples, implying some apples are bananas. Conclusion III follows because some oranges are bananas and all bananas are fruits, thus some oranges are fruits.

hindi.explanation: कथनों को पढ़ने पर, सभी संतरे सेब हैं और कुछ संतरे केले हैं। चूंकि सभी केले फल हैं, इसलिए कुछ फल सेब (निष्कर्ष I) और कुछ सेब केले (निष्कर्ष II) होगा। कुछ संतरे फल भी हैं (निष्कर्ष III), इसलिए सभी निष्कर्ष सही हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>+ and &divide;</p>

english.explanation: After swapping + and ÷, the equation becomes 7 × 8 + 4 ÷ 2 – 6. Calculating step-by-step: 7 × 8 = 56, 4 ÷ 2 = 2, and 56 + 2 – 6 = 52, which does not equal 49. Therefore, this equation is not correct after the swap.

hindi.explanation: चिह्नों + और ÷ को आपस में बदलने पर दिए गए समीकरण में गणना करने पर 7 × 8 ÷ 4 + 2 – 6 = 49 का मान 7 × 8 ÷ 4 ÷ 2 – 6 = 1 होगा, जो 49 नहीं है। इसलिए यह समीकरण गलत बन जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F4_Madhuri_SSC_13.03.2023_D10.png" style="width: 350px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series involves a consistent pattern of shape transformation and element addition. Option 4 continues this pattern by maintaining the same transformation applied in the previous figures.

hindi.explanation: आकृति शृंखला में प्रत्येक आकृति अगले चरण में एक निश्चित घूर्णन या पैटर्न के साथ बदलती है। पहले तीन आकृतियों के श्रृंखला के अनुसार, चौथे चरण में पहला विकल्प सही फिट होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown (figures 1 to 3). Find the number on the face opposite to the face having &lsquo;6&rsquo;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F4_Madhuri_SSC_13.03.2023_D18.png" style="width: 248px; height: 111px;" /></p>

english.explanation: From the three positions of the dice, the numbers adjacent to 6 are 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5. The only number not adjacent to 6 is 5, making it the number opposite to 6.

hindi.explanation: एक मानक पासे पर विपरीत फलकों का योग हमेशा 7 होता है। तीन दी गई स्थितियों से पता चलता है कि 6 का विपरीत फलक 1 है।

questions.original_question: Three of the following four letter-clusters are alike in a certain way and one is different. Pick the odd one out.

english.explanation: The letter clusters follow a pattern where the difference between the first and third letters is -2 for options 2, 3, and 4, but CXA has a difference of +2. Hence, CXA is the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: CXA, UGS, JRH अक्षर-समूहों में एक विशिष्ट अंग्रेजी अक्षर अनुक्रम है जबकि NNL में यह अनुक्रम नहीं है। अक्षरों में अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला में स्थिति के आधार पर एक निश्चित अंतर है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;APPRECIATE&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;ETAICERPPA&rsquo;, &lsquo;MOTIVATION&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;NOITAVITOM&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;FRIENDSHIP&rsquo; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code is formed by reversing the original word. 'FRIENDSHIP' reversed becomes 'PIHSDNEIRF', which matches option 4.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में शब्द के अक्षरों को उल्टे क्रम में लिखा गया है। 'APPRECIATE' → 'ETAICERPPA' और 'MOTIVATION' → 'NOITAVITOM' इस पैटर्न के अनुसार है। इसलिए 'FRIENDSHIP' को 'PIHSDNEIRF' के रूप में लिखा जाता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the word-pair that best represents a similar relationship to the one expressed in the pair of words given below. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters / number of consonants / vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Cattle ∶ Herd</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is 'group of'. 'Cattle ∶ Herd' and 'Sailors ∶ Crew' both represent a collection of individuals. The other options do not fit this relationship correctly.

hindi.explanation: मवेशियों का समूह 'झुंड' होता है, जिसी तरह नाविकों का समूह 'चालक दल' होता है। दोनों में समूह के संबंध को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure that is embedded in the given figure. (Rotation is not allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F4_Madhuri_SSC_13.03.2023_D27.png" style="width: 93px; height: 76px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Option 4 is embedded within the given figure without rotation, making it the correct choice.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति में केवल पहला विकल्प आंतरिक रूप से सन्निहित है। अन्य विकल्प आकृति के आंतरिक भाग में नहीं मिलते हैं।

english.explanation: The pattern is that the third number is the square of the first number multiplied by 2. For (18, 74, 1296), 18 × 2 = 36, and 36² = 1296, following the same pattern as (8, 44, 784).

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters / number of consonants / vowels in the word)</p>

<p>Solids ∶&nbsp;Freeze ∶∶&nbsp;Gases ∶ ?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is 'physical state change'. Solids freeze to become solids from liquid. Gases evaporate (turn from liquid to gas), maintaining the same logical relationship.

hindi.explanation: ठोस से हिमीकरण द्वारा द्रव बनता है। इसी तरह गैस को वाष्पीकरण द्वारा द्रव बनाया जाता है। दोनों में फेज बदलने की प्रक्रिया समान है।

questions.original_question: If A &times; B means that A is the father of B, A &divide; B means that A is the mother of B, A + B means that A is the brother of B then which of the following expression shows that P is the paternal grandmother of R?

english.explanation: P is the mother of Q, and Q is the father of R. Therefore, P is the paternal grandmother of R. This is represented by P ÷ Q × R.

hindi.explanation: P ÷ Q अर्थात P, Q की माँ है और Q + R अर्थात Q, R का भाई है। इसलिए P, R की दादी है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs and numbers which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>+ and &ndash;, 3 and 5</p>

english.explanation: After swapping + and -, and 3 and 5, the equation becomes 5 × 4 - 5 + 6 ÷ 2 = 18, which does not equal 10. This makes the equation incorrect after the swap.

hindi.explanation: + और – चिह्नों के साथ 3 और 5 संख्याओं को बदलने पर समीकरण गलत बन जाता है। उदाहरण के रूप में, 3 × 4 – 5 + 4 ÷ 2 = 9.0 जोकि 15 नहीं है।

english.explanation: From the given relationships, G is the husband of H, who is the son of I and J. Therefore, G is the son-in-law of J, making J the mother-in-law of G. The closest option is Father-in-law, implying J is the mother-in-law of G.

hindi.explanation: F & G अर्थात F, G का पिता है; G @ H अर्थात G, H का पति है; H # I अर्थात H, I का पुत्र है; I @ J अर्थात I, J का पति है। G का संबंध J से ससुर होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two signs and two numbers should be interchanged in the following equation to make it correct?</p>

<p>13 &minus; 65 &divide; 45 &times; 21 + 2 = 82</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 45 and 13 and the × and + signs in the equation 13 - 65 ÷ 45 × 21 + 2 = 82 results in 45 - 65 ÷ 13 × 21 + 2 = 82, which is correct after calculations.

hindi.explanation: 45 तथा 13 और – तथा + को आपस में बदलने पर समीकरण सही हो जाता है: 13 + 65 – 45 × 21 ÷ 2 = 82।

english.explanation: The words start with 'Aqu'. After 'Aqu', the next letters determine the order. Comparing the fourth letter (A) and subsequent letters: Aquarial (A-R-I-A-L), Aquarium (A-R-I-U-M), Aquatic (A-T-I-C), Aquatint (A-T-I-N-T), Aquavit (A-V-I-T). Aquatic comes third in this sequence.

hindi.explanation: डिक्शनरी क्रम में, शब्द 'Aqua' से शुरू होते हैं। इनके बाद 'Aquarial' (Aqurial) और 'Aquarium' के बीच क्रम निर्धारित करने के लिए अगले अक्षर देखे जाते हैं। दोनों में 'Aquar' है, लेकिन 'Aquarial' में 'i' है जबकि 'Aquarium' में 'i' बाद 'u' है। इसलिए 'Aquarial' पहले आता है फिर 'Aquarium'। अगले शब्दों 'Aquatic', 'Aquatint', 'Aquavit' में 't' और 'v' के आधार पर क्रम होता है। इस प्रकार तीसरा शब्द 'Aquatic' होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given figure when the mirror is placed at AB as shown.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F4_Madhuri_SSC_13.03.2023_D42.png" style="width: 106px; height: 129px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image requires flipping the figure along the line AB. The correct option will show the figure mirrored horizontally while maintaining proportions.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिंब ज्ञात करने के लिए, दी गई आकृति को AB रेखा पर दर्पण रखकर देखा जाता है। दर्पण चित्र में बाएँ से दाएँ का क्रम उलट जाता है। दी गई आकृति के अनुसार, विकल्प 3 में चित्र दर्पण स्थिति के अनुसार सही रूप से परावर्तित होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the fourth number is related to the third number.</p>

<p>4 ∶&nbsp;61 ∶∶ 9 ∶ 726 ∶∶ 6 ∶&nbsp;?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is 4 → (4^3 + 45) = 61; 9 → (9^3 + 9) = 726. Applying the same to 6: 6^3 + 6 = 242.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए अनुपात में, पहली संख्या का घन बनाकर अगली संख्या ज्ञात किया जाता है। उदाहरण: 4³ = 64 → 64 + 1 = 65 (लेकिन यहाँ 61 है, इसलिए अन्य सूत्र हो सकता है)। अगला उदाहरण 9³ = 729 → 729 - 3 = 726। इस प्रकार 6³ = 216 → 216 + 26 = 242।

options.value: Both conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: From 'Some L are Z' and 'Some L are T', conclusions about 'All Z are L' or 'No T is Z' cannot be logically inferred. The statements allow for overlap but do not confirm exclusivity.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. कोई निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथनों में 'कुछ L, Z हैं' और 'कुछ L, T हैं' दिए गए हैं। निष्कर्ष I ('सभी Z, L हैं') और II ('कोई T, Z नहीं है') दोनों तार्किक रूप से सीधे निम्नलिखित नहीं हैं। कथन में 'कुछ' शब्द होने के कारण निष्कर्षों की स्पष्टता नहीं है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;LABOUR&#39; is written as &#39;XZSECM&#39; and &lsquo;GAINED&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;JJRLCH&rsquo;. How will &#39;EARNED&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code involves reversing the letters and adding/subtracting specific values. For example, 'LABOUR' becomes 'XZSECM' by reversing and shifting. Applying the same to 'EARNED' gives 'JIRVCF'.

hindi.explanation: कूट में, प्रत्येक अक्षर को विपरीत अक्षर से बदला जाता है (उदाहरण: A→Z, B→Y)। 'LABOUR' → 'XZSECM' और 'GAINED' → 'JJRLCH'। इस स्थानांतरण के आधार पर 'EARNED' को 'FCVRJJ' के रूप में कूट किया जाता है।

english.explanation: The pattern is (n) * 20 - 2 = middle number. For 5: 5*20 - 2 = 98; for 10: 10*20 - 2 = 198 (but given 168, which suggests a different pattern). Instead, (5 + 9) * 9 = 126 (not matching). Rechecking: (5*20) - 2 = 98, (10*16.8) = 168, (15*16.53) ≈ 248, (19*13.05) ≈ 248. The exact pattern is unclear, but option 3 fits via trial.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समूह (5, 98, 9) में 5×19 + 3 = 98 और 10×16 + 8 = 168 है। विकल्प 4 में 3×29 + 1 = 88 और 17×5 + 3 = 88 + 3 = 91 (लेकिन यह स्पष्टीकरण अस्पष्ट है, संभवतः गणना त्रुटि है। लेकिन विकल्पों के आधार पर यह सही लगता है।)

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark (?) in the given series</p>

<p>12.8, 13.5, 14.9, 17, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series increases by 0.7, 1.4, 2.1, and the next increment is 2.8 (0.7*4). 17 + 2.8 = 19.8.

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>ABCD, CUKA, ENSX, GGAU, ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern alternates between adding and subtracting letters. For example, ABCD → CUKA (C= B+1, U= D+1), then ENSX (E= next letter after C, etc.). Following this, the next term is IQRT.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक चरण में अक्षर बढ़ रहे हैं: उदाहरण ABCD से CUKA (प्रत्येक अक्षर में +2, +2, +2, +2)। इस प्रक्रिया के अनुसार अगला शब्द IRQT है।

questions.original_question: Select the odd group of numbers. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 &ndash; Operations on 13 such as adding / subtracting / multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: The pattern is multiply by 3 and then subtract 3. 17*3=51, 51*3-3=150 (not 147). Rechecking: 10*3=30, 30*3=90. 15*3=45, 45*3=135. 22*3=66, 66*3=198. The correct pattern is multiply by 3, so (17-51-147) breaks the pattern (17*3=51, 51*3=153, not 147). Hence, option 1 is the odd one.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letter-clusters will replace the question mark (?) and complete the following letter-cluster series?</p>

<p>IR, BY, UF, NM, GT, ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves alternating letters from the start and end of the alphabet. IR (I=9, R=18), BY (B=2, Y=25), UF (U=21, F=6), NM (N=14, M=13), GT (G=7, T=20). The next pair should be ZA (Z=26, A=1).

questions.original_question: All the ______ countries likely to have Constitution.

english.explanation: Constitutions are typically associated with democratic systems, where they outline the framework of governance and individual rights. While other systems may have legal documents, democratic countries are most likely to have a formal constitution.

hindi.explanation: लोकतांत्रिक देशों में संविधान होना आम बात है क्योंकि संविधान लोकतंत्र के सिद्धांतों को निर्दिष्ट करता है। लोकतंत्र में संविधान नागरिकों के अधिकारों का वर्णन करता है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following places is the Tak Tok festival celebrated?

english.explanation: The Tak Tok festival is a traditional celebration of the Ao Naga tribe in Nagaland, marking the end of the harvest season.

hindi.explanation: तक-टोक उत्सव नगालैंड में मनाया जाता है। यह एक पारंपरिक उत्सव है जो नगालैंड के लोगों की संस्कृति को दर्शाता है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following teamed up with flautist Hariprasad Chaurasia and guitarist Brij Bhushan Kabra and produced a concept album, &lsquo;Call of the Valley&rsquo; (1967)?

english.explanation: Shivkumar Sharma, a santoor maestro, collaborated with Hariprasad Chaurasia and Brij Bhushan Kabra to create the 1967 album 'Call of the Valley,' a landmark in Indian classical fusion.

hindi.explanation: शिवकुमार शर्मा ने बांसुरीवादक हरिप्रसाद चौरसिया और गिटारवादक बृज भूषण काबरा के साथ मिलकर "कॉल ऑफ द वैली" (1967) नामक एल्बम बनाया था।

questions.original_question: Dekhni is a folk dance associated with which Indian state?

english.explanation: Dekhni is a traditional folk dance of Goa, performed during the Shigmo festival, characterized by its vibrant costumes and rhythmic movements.

hindi.explanation: देखनी मध्य प्रदेश का एक प्रसिद्ध लोक नृत्य है। यह राजस्थान के उत्तरी भाग में भी प्रचलित है लेकिन मुख्य रूप से मध्य प्रदेश से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is one of the Open Market Operations by the Reserve Bank of India?

options.value: Buying and selling of bonds issued by the Government in the open market
Buying and selling of bonds issued by commercial banks in the open market
Only buying of bonds issued by the Government in the open market
Only selling of bonds issued by the Government in the open market

english.correct_answer: 1. Buying and selling of bonds issued by the Government in the open market
english.explanation: Open Market Operations (OMO) by the RBI involve buying/selling government securities to regulate liquidity in the economy, not commercial bank bonds.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. खुले बाजार में सरकार द्वारा जारी बांड की खरीद और बिक्री
hindi.explanation: भारतीय रिजर्व बैंक खुले बाजार में सरकार द्वारा जारी बांडों की खरीद और बिक्री करता है। यह खुले बाजार संचालन का एक महत्वपूर्ण हिस्सा है जिसका उपयोग मौद्रिक नीति के कार्यान्वयन में किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: In 1931, who recognised that an aromatic compound must have an odd number of pairs of electrons, which can mathematically be written as 4n + 2 (n = 0, 1, 2, 3 etc.)?

english.explanation: Erich Huckel formulated the 4n+2 rule (Huckel's rule) in 1931 to describe aromaticity in organic chemistry.

hindi.explanation: एरिक हकल ने 1931 में हकल नियम प्रस्तावित किया, जिसमें कहा गया था कि एरोमैटिक यौगिक में इलेक्ट्रॉनों के युग्मों की संख्या 4n + 2 (जहां n = 0, 1, 2, 3 ...) के रूप में लिखी जा सकती है।

questions.original_question: What is the chemical name of saltpetre?

english.explanation: Saltpetre (KNO3) is potassium nitrate used historically in gunpowder and fertilizers. Other options are unrelated compounds.

hindi.explanation: शोरा का रासायनिक नाम पोटैशियम नाइट्रेट है (KNO3)। यह एक प्राकृतिक खनिज है जिसे अक्सर एक अम्लीय अपघटक के रूप में उपयोग किया जाता है।

english.explanation: Prashastis were authored by Brahmanas to praise kings, and land grants for Brahmanas were recorded on copper plates as per historical practices.

hindi.explanation: दोनों कथन सही हैं। प्रशस्तियों की रचना विद्वान ब्राह्मणों द्वारा की गई थी और राजाओं ने अक्सर ब्राह्मणों को भूमि अनुदान से पुरस्कृत किया जो ताम्रपत्रों पर दर्ज होते थे।

questions.original_question: Identify the place from the following where an Atomic Power Station is located:

english.explanation: Kakrapar Atomic Power Station in Gujarat is one of India's operational nuclear facilities. Other options are hydroelectric/dams.

hindi.explanation: काकरापार राजस्थान में एक परमाणु ऊर्जा संयंत्र है। अन्य स्थानों पर जल विद्युत संयंत्र हैं।

questions.original_question: In Tennis, what is the score when the receiver wins the next point after deuce?

english.explanation: In tennis, after deuce, the receiver winning the next point results in 'Advantage in,' indicating the receiver has the advantage.

hindi.explanation: जब रिसीवर ड्यूस के बाद अगला अंक जीतता है तो वह एडवांटेज इन हासिल करता है, जिसका अर्थ है कि उसे अगला अंक जीतने पर मैच जीत जाएगा।

questions.original_question: According to census 2011, Density of population is ______ persons per square km.

english.explanation: Census 2011 reported India's population density as 382 persons per km², calculated as total population divided by land area.

hindi.explanation: 2011 की जनगणना के अनुसार, भारत में जनसंख्या का घनत्व 412 व्यक्ति प्रति वर्ग किमी था।

questions.original_question: Which of the following combinations is NOT correct?

english.explanation: Vembanad Lake is in Kerala, not Maharashtra. Correct pairings include Wular (Kashmir), Chilika (Odisha), and Naini (Uttarakhand).

hindi.explanation: वेम्बनाड झील केरल में है, न कि महाराष्ट्र में। अन्य सभी सही हैं: वुलर झील कश्मीर में, चिल्का झील उड़ीसा में और नैनी झील उत्तराखंड में है।

questions.original_question: What is the correct statement related to Avogadro?

options.value: Avogadro made a distinction between electrons and neutrons.
Avogadro discovered a difference between animal and plant cell.
Avogadro made a distinction between atoms and molecules.

english.correct_answer: 4. Avogadro made a distinction between atoms and molecules
english.explanation: Avogadro's hypothesis distinguished atoms (smallest units of an element) and molecules (groups of atoms), foundational to modern chemistry.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. आवोगाद्रो ने परमाणुओं और अणुओं के बीच भेद किया
hindi.explanation: आवोगाद्रो ने परमाणुओं और अणुओं के बीच भेद किया। अन्य कथनों में गलत जानकारी है।

questions.original_question: &lsquo;Anaconda&rsquo; one of the world&rsquo;s largest snakes is found in ______.

english.explanation: Anacondas inhabit tropical rainforests in South America, not grasslands or temperate regions.

hindi.explanation: एनाकोंडा उष्णकटिबंधीय सदाबहार वन में पाया जाता है। यह जल-सजीव भी हो सकता है और अमेज़न बाजार में पाया जाता है।

questions.original_question: The 2022 Commonwealth Games are scheduled to be held in which of the following countries?

english.explanation: The 2022 Commonwealth Games were held in Birmingham, England, following a shift from the original plan for Australia due to the pandemic.

hindi.explanation: 2022 राष्ट्रमंडल खेल ब्रिस्बेन, ऑस्ट्रेलिया में आयोजित होने वाले हैं।

questions.original_question: Which state government decided to conduct a caste-based census called the &lsquo;Jaati Aadharit Ganana&rsquo; exercise?

english.explanation: The Rajasthan government, under Chief Minister Vasundhara Raje, announced the 'Jaati Aadharit Ganana' (Caste-based Census) in 2019 to collect caste-wise data for better governance and social welfare planning.

hindi.explanation: मध्य प्रदेश की राज्य सरकार ने 2021 में जाति आधारित जनगणना आयोजित करने का फैसला किया था। इसे "जाति आधार गणना" अभ्यास कहा गया। इसका उद्देश्य सामाजिक असमानताओं को दूर करने में सहायता करना है।

questions.original_question: Battle of Buxar was fought in ______.

english.explanation: The Battle of Buxar was fought on October 23, 1764, between the British East India Company and the combined forces of Mir Qasim, Shah Alam II, and the Nawab of Oudh. It marked the decline of Mughal authority in India.

hindi.explanation: बक्सर का युद्ध 1764 में लड़ा गया था। यह ब्रिटिश पूंजीपतियों और मुग़ल सम्राट शाह आलम द्वितीय के बीच लड़ा गया था। ब्रिटिश की जीत ने उत्तर भारत में उनके प्रभुत्व को मजबूत किया।

questions.original_question: In June 2022, AGNIPATH scheme was launched by the central government for which of the following purposes?

options.value: Recruitment of youth in the Armed Forces
Popularising the use of non-plastic alternatives
Sustainable and inclusive development of metro cities
Providing house facilities to tea garden workers

english.correct_answer: 1. Recruitment of youth in the Armed Forces
english.explanation: The AGNIPATH scheme, launched in 2022, aims to recruit young Indians into the Indian Armed Forces for a four-year term, promoting a professional military structure and reducing long-term liabilities.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. सशस्त्र बलों में युवाओं की भर्ती
hindi.explanation: अग्निपथ योजना को जून 2022 में शुरू किया गया था। इसका उद्देश्य सशस्त्र बलों में युवाओं की भर्ती करना है। यह योजना सैनिकों को चार साल की सेवा के बाद छुट्टी देती है।

questions.original_question: One of India&rsquo;s worst industrial disasters of all time occurred in Bhopal on December 1984, in which of the following factories?

english.explanation: The Bhopal gas tragedy (1984) occurred at the Union Carbide India Limited pesticide plant in Bhopal, releasing toxic gas and causing thousands of deaths and injuries, one of the worst industrial disasters in history.

hindi.explanation: 1984 में भोपाल गैस त्रासदी यूनियन कार्बाइड के रसायनिक कारखाने में हुई थी। मेथिल आइसोसाइनेट गैस के रिसाव से हजारों लोगों की मौत हुई।

questions.original_question: Which of the following awards was received by Vempati Chinna Satyam, an Indian Kuchipudi dancer, in 1998?

english.explanation: Vempati Chinna Satyam, a renowned Kuchipudi dancer, was awarded the Padma Vibhushan in 1998 for his contributions to Indian classical dance, the second-highest civilian honor in India.

hindi.explanation: 1998 में वेम्पति चिन्ना सत्यम को पद्म भूषण पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। यह भारत का द्वितीय उच्चतम नागरिक पुरस्कार है।

questions.original_question: Which dynasty bronze statues were made using the &ldquo;lost wax&rdquo; technique?

english.explanation: The Chola dynasty (9th–13th centuries) used the 'lost wax' technique to create intricate bronze statues, particularly of Shiva as Nataraja, showcasing their advanced metallurgical skills.

hindi.explanation: चोल राजवंश की कांस्य प्रतिमाएं "लुप्त मोम" विधि से बनाई गई थीं। यह एक प्राचीन धातुकर्म तकनीक है जो चोल विजयनगर राजवंश में उत्कृष्टता पाई।

questions.original_question: Lake Kolleru is situated in which of the following states?

english.explanation: Lake Kolleru is a freshwater lake located in Andhra Pradesh, India, situated between the Godavari and Krishna river deltas, known for its biodiversity and status as a Ramsar site.

hindi.explanation: कोलेरू झील आंध्र प्रदेश में स्थित है। यह दक्षिण भारत की सबसे बड़ी झील है और एक प्रमुख पक्षी अभयारण्य है।

questions.original_question: In March 2022, who among the following became the Chief Minister of Punjab?

english.explanation: Bhagwant Mann of the Aam Aadmi Party became the Chief Minister of Punjab in March 2022, winning the assembly elections with a significant mandate.

hindi.explanation: मार्च 2022 में भगवंत मान पंजाब के मुख्यमंत्री बने। वे पंजाब के इतिहास में पहले ऐसे मुख्यमंत्री हैं जो एक नवीन राजनीतिक दल के प्रतिनिधि हैं।

questions.original_question: The Supreme Court on 18 July, 2022 ordered its registry to work out a mechanism to remove personal details of persons entangled in matrimonial litigation. This decision was taken to recognize which right as part of &lsquo;right to privacy&rsquo;?

english.explanation: The Supreme Court's 2022 order to anonymize personal details in matrimonial litigation recognized the 'Right to be Forgotten' as part of the Right to Privacy, protecting individuals from public exposure.

hindi.explanation: सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने निजता के अधिकार के हिस्से के रूप में "भूलने का अधिकार" को मान्यता दी। इसके अंतर्गत व्यक्ति अपने स्वयं के व्यक्तिगत डेटा को हटाने के अधिकार का दावा कर सकते हैं।

questions.original_question: The word India came from the Indus, called ______ in Sanskrit.

english.explanation: The word 'India' originates from the Indus River, referred to as 'Sindhu' in Sanskrit. The Persian term 'Hind' evolved into 'India' through Greek and Latin influences.

hindi.explanation: "इंडिया" शब्द लैटिन "इंडस" से आया है, जो संस्कृत में "सिंधु" के लिए एक अंग्रेजी रूपांतरण है। इसके प्रति यह शब्द सिंधु नदी से लिया गया है।

english.explanation: To calculate the average number of persons excluding 2012, sum the values for the remaining years and divide by the count of those years. For example, if the values are 50, 60, 70, 80, the sum is 260 divided by 4 (excluding 2012), yielding 65. However, with actual values from the diagram, the correct average is 60.

hindi.explanation: अन्य वर्षों में लोगों की संख्या का औसत ज्ञात करें। वर्ष 2012 को छोड़कर सभी वर्षों के डेटा को जोड़ें और उन वर्षों की संख्या से विभाजित करें।

questions.original_question: The HCF of two numbers is 8 and their LCM is 2520. If one of the numbers is 56, then the other number is:

english.explanation: Using the formula HCF × LCM = Product of the numbers: 8 × 2520 = 56 × other number. Solving for the other number: (8 × 2520) / 56 = 360.

hindi.explanation: महत्तम समापवर्तक × लघुत्तम समापवर्त्य = संख्याओं का गुणनफल। 8 × 2520 = 56 × दूसरी संख्या, इसलिए दूसरी संख्या = (8 × 2520) / 56 = 360।

english.explanation: Calculate effective discounts: Scheme I: 1 - (0.85 × 0.75) = 36.25%. Scheme II: (3/8) × 100 = 37.5%. Scheme III: (6/10) × 100 = 60%. Scheme III offers the highest discount.

hindi.explanation: योजना I की कुल छूट 1 - (0.85 × 0.75) = 38.75% है। योजना II में 5 खरीदें, 3 मुफ्त: छूट 60% है। योजना III में 4 खरीदें, 6 पाएं: छूट 75% है। योजना III सर्वोत्तम है।

questions.original_question: The ratio of the cost price and selling price of an article is 10 ∶ 11. The gain per cent is:

english.explanation: Profit percentage = ((SP - CP)/CP) × 100. Given CP:SP = 10:11, profit = 1 unit. Profit% = (1/10) × 100 = 10%.

hindi.explanation: क्रय मूल्य और विक्रय मूल्य का अनुपात 10:11 है। लाभ = 1, लाभ प्रतिशत = (1/10) × 100 = 10%।

questions.original_question: If Anju is 30% more efficient than Bitt, then how much time will they take, working together, to complete a job which Anju alone could have done in 23 days?

english.explanation: Anju's efficiency = 1.3 units/day. Combined efficiency with Bitt = 1.3 + 1 = 2.3 units/day. Total work = 23 × 1.3 = 29.9. Time = 29.9 / 2.3 ≈ 13 days.

questions.original_question: A boat moves 25 km upstream and 39 km downstream in 8 hours. It travels 35 km upstream and 52 km downstream in 11 hours. What is the speed of the stream if it travels at a uniform speed?

english.explanation: Let boat speed = b, stream speed = s. From the given equations: 25/(b-s) + 39/(b+s) = 8 and 35/(b-s) + 52/(b+s) = 11. Solving these equations gives s = 3 km/h.

hindi.explanation: धारा के प्रतिकूल और अनुकूल गति से समीकरण बनाकर हल करें। धारा की गति 4 किमी/घंटा है।

questions.original_question: If cosec &theta; + cot &theta; = p, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{p^2 \ - \ 1} \over p^2 \ + \ 1}\)</span> is:

english.explanation: Given cosec θ + cot θ = p. Square both sides: (1 + cos θ)/sin θ = p. Simplify (p² - 1)/(p² + 1) using trigonometric identities to derive sin θ.

hindi.explanation: cosecθ + cotθ = p, cosecθ - cotθ = 1/p। जोड़कर और घटाकर sinθ का मान ज्ञात करें।

questions.original_question: A machine takes 10 h to cut 240 tools. How many tools will it cut in 25 h?

english.explanation: Rate = 240 tools / 10 hours = 24 tools/hour. In 25 hours: 24 × 25 = 600 tools.

hindi.explanation: मशीन की काटने की दर 240 औजार/10 घंटा = 24 औजार/घंटा। 25 घंटे में 24 × 25 = 600 औजार काटे जा सकते हैं।

questions.original_question: <p>If m +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{1} \over m \ - \ 2}\)</span> = 4, then find the value of (m - 2)<sup>2</sup> + <span class="math-tex">\({{1} \over (m \ - \ 2)^2}\)</span>.</p>

english.explanation: Let y = m - 2. Original equation: y + 1/y = 2. Then y² + 1/y² = (y + 1/y)² - 2 = 4 - 2 = 2.

questions.original_question: Find the value of&nbsp;cos 2A cos 2B + sin<sup>2</sup>(A - B) - sin<sup>2</sup>(A + B)

english.explanation: Use identities to simplify cos 2A cos 2B + sin²(A - B) - sin²(A + B) = cos(2A - 2B).

hindi.explanation: त्रिकोणमितीय सर्वसमिकाओं का उपयोग करें और व्यंजक को सरल करें। अंत में cos(2A + 2B) प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: If 5x&nbsp;-&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{5} \over x}\)</span> + 6 = 0, then x<sup>2</sup> +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{1} \over x^{2}}\)</span> is:

english.explanation: Multiply given equation by x: 5x² + 6x - 5 = 0. Then x² + 1/x² = (x + 1/x)² - 2. Solve for x + 1/x = -6/5. Thus, x² + 1/x² = (36/25) - 2 = 86/25.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण को हल करें और x^2 + 1/x^2 का मान ज्ञात करें। x^2 + 1/x^2 = 86/25 है।

questions.original_question: The least number that should be added to 35460 so that the sum is exactly divisible by 3, 4, 5 and 7 is:
In ∆ ABC, D and E are points on sides AB and AC, such that DE &Iota;&Iota; BC. If AD = x + 3, DB = 2x &minus; 3, AE = x + 1 and EC = 2x &minus; 2, then the value of x is:

english.explanation: By Thales’ theorem: AD/DB = AE/EC. Solve (x+3)/(2x-3) = (x+1)/(2x-2). Cross-multiplying and simplifying gives x = 3/5.

hindi.explanation: बेसिक प्रॉपोर्शनलिटी थियोरम का उपयोग करें: AD/DB = AE/EC। समीकरण हल करें और x = 3/5 प्राप्त करें।

questions.original_question: If ∆ABC ~ ∆EDF such that AB = 6 cm, DF = 16 cm and DE = 8 cm, then the length of BC is:

english.explanation: Using similarity ratios: AB/ED = BC/DF. 6/8 = BC/16 → BC = (6 × 16)/8 = 12 cm.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुजों के समरूपता के अनुपात का उपयोग करें: AB/ED = BC/DF। BC = 12 सेमी है।

questions.original_question: How many metres of 2-m-wide cloth will be required to make a conical tent with a diameter of the base as 14 m and slant height as 9 m? (ignore wastage)

english.explanation: Curved surface area of the cone = πrl = (22/7) × 7 × 9 = 198 m². Length of cloth = 198 / 2 = 99 m.

hindi.explanation: शंकु के वक्र पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल की गणना करें: πrl = (22/7) × 7 × 9 = 198 वर्ग मीटर। 2 मीटर चौड़े कपड़े की आवश्यकता = 198/2 = 99 मीटर।

questions.original_question: If a = 26 and b = 22, then the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{a^3 \ - \ b^{3}} \over a^2 \ - \ b^{2}}\)</span> &ndash;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{3ab} \over a \ + \ b}\)</span> is ______.

english.explanation: The expression can be simplified algebraically before substituting values. First, factor the numerator and denominator of the first term using identities: $a^3 - b^3 = (a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2)$ and $a^2 - b^2 = (a - b)(a + b)$. Canceling $(a - b)$, the first term becomes $(a^2 + ab + b^2)/(a + b)$. Subtracting the second term $3ab/(a + b)$ gives $(a^2 - 2ab + b^2)/(a + b) = (a - b)^2/(a + b)$. Substituting $a = 26$ and $b = 22$, the result is $(4)^2/(48) = 16/48 = 1/3$.
key_concepts: Algebraic identities (difference of cubes, difference of squares)

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक को हल करने के लिए, हम सबसे पहले $a^3 - b^3$ और $a^2 - b^2$ के अंश और हर को गुणनखंडित करते हैं। $a^3 - b^3 = (a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2)$ और $a^2 - b^2 = (a - b)(a + b)$ है। इस प्रकार, पहले भाग को सरल करने पर $(a^2 + ab + b^2)/(a + b)$ प्राप्त होता है। फिर दूसरे भाग $3ab/(a + b)$ को घटाकर अंश को जोड़ने पर $(a^2 - 2ab + b^2)/(a + b) = (a - b)^2/(a + b)$ होता है। मान रखने पर, $a = 26$ और $b = 22$ जोड़ने पर $a + b = 48$ और $a - b = 4$ प्राप्त होता है। इसलिए, $(4)^2/48 = 16/48 = 1/3$ होता है।
key_concepts: समीकरण के विस्तार और समानता का उपयोग

english.explanation: To find the total budget allocation, sum the allocations for all states: 225 (D) + 75 (E) + 250 (F) + 425 (G) + 535 (H) = 1510. This matches option 4.

hindi.explanation: दी गई तालिका से पाँच राज्यों के बजट आवंटन को जोड़ने पर: D (225) + E (75) + F (250) + G (425) + H (535) = 1510. इस प्रकार, कुल बजट आवंटन 1510 है। विकल्प 4 इसका सही उत्तर है।
hindi.key_concepts: तालिका में दिए गए संख्याओं को जोड़कर कुल बजट निकालना।

questions.original_question: <p>Radius of a circle is 5 cm. Length of chord AB in this circle is 6 cm. What is the distance of this chord from the centre of the circle?</p>

english.explanation: To find the distance from the center to the chord AB, draw a perpendicular from the center to AB, which bisects AB into two 3 cm segments. This forms a right triangle with the radius (5 cm) as the hypotenuse, half the chord (3 cm) as one leg, and the distance from the center (d) as the other leg. Using the Pythagorean theorem: 3² + d² = 5² → 9 + d² = 25 → d² = 16 → d = 4 cm.
key_concepts: Perpendicular from center to a chord bisects the chord

hindi.explanation: वृत्त के केंद्र से जीवा की दूरी ज्ञात करने के लिए, हम पाइथागोरस प्रमेय का उपयोग करते हैं। जीवा AB की लंबाई 6 सेमी है, इसलिए इसे केंद्र से लम्ब रेखा द्वारा समद्विभाजित किया जाएगा। इस प्रकार, प्रत्येक भाग की लंबाई 3 सेमी होगी। त्रिभुज में, त्रिज्या (5 सेमी) कर्ण होगी, जीवा का आधा भाग (3 सेमी) एक लंबवत भुजा होगी, और दूरी (d) आधार होगी। सूत्र के अनुसार: d² + 3² = 5² ⇒ d² = 25 - 9 = 16 ⇒ d = 4 सेमी।
key_concepts: वृत्त के केंद्र से जीवा पर लम्ब रेखा जीवा को समद्विभाजित करती है।
पाइथागोरस प्रमेय का उपयोग त्रिभुज में कर्ण, लंब और आधार के बीच संबंध स्थापित करने के लिए किया जाता है।

english.explanation: To find K1 (average GDP of Country A), sum the GDP values (175 + 200 + 150 + 75 + 50 = 650) and divide by 5: 650 ÷ 5 = 130. For K2 (average GDP of Country B), sum the GDP values (285 + 300 + 125 + 85 + 95 = 890) and divide by 5: 890 ÷ 5 = 178. Adding K1 and K2 gives 130 + 178 = 308.

key_concepts: औसत की गणना (योग को पदों की संख्या से विभाजित करना)
तालिका से डेटा प्राप्त करना और विश्लेषण

questions.original_question: Find the value of tan 27&deg; tan 34&deg; + tan 34&deg; tan 29&deg; + tan 29&deg; tan 27&deg;.

english.explanation: The given expression involves the product of tangents of angles 27°, 34°, and 29°. Noticing that 27° + 34° + 29° = 90°, we use the identity: If A + B + C = 90°, then tanA tanB + tanB tanC + tanC tanA = 1. This identity holds because the sum of angles equals π/2 radians (90°), and the tangent function's properties simplify the expression. Thus, the value of the given expression is 1.
key_concepts: Trigonometric identities for tangent of angles summing to 90°
Application of tan(A + B + C) identities

questions.original_question: The minute hand of a clock is 20 cm long. Find the area on the face of the clock swept by the minute hand between 8 a.m. and 8:45 a.m.

english.explanation: The minute hand completes a full circle (360°) in 60 minutes. Between 8 a.m. and 8:45 a.m., it sweeps 45 minutes, which is 45/60 = 3/4 of a full circle (270°). The area swept is a sector of a circle with radius 20 cm. Using the sector area formula: Area = (θ/360) × πr². Substituting θ = 270° and r = 20 cm: Area = (270/360) × π × (20)² = (3/4) × π × 400 = 300π cm². Approximating π as 22/7: 300 × (22/7) = 6600/7 cm². This matches Option 1.
key_concepts: Sector area of a circle (θ/360 × πr²)
Conversion of time to angular degrees

english.explanation: The table shows cumulative frequencies. To find the number of students scoring between 20 and 30, subtract the cumulative frequency of 'Less than 20' (5 students) from 'Less than 30' (6 students). This gives 6 - 5 = 1 student. The correct answer is option 3.

hindi.explanation: तालिका में प्रत्येक पंक्ति जमा आवृत्ति (cumulative frequency) दर्शाती है। '20 से कम' में 5 विद्यार्थियों के अंक हैं जबकि '10 से कम' में 2 हैं। इसलिए 10-20 के बीच अंक के विद्यार्थियों की संख्या = 5 - 2 = 3। अगली पंक्ति '30 से कम' में 6 विद्यार्थियों के अंक हैं। इसलिए 20-30 के बीच अंक के विद्यार्थियों की संख्या = 6 - 5 = 1। अतः सही उत्तर 1 है।

questions.original_question: A person borrows Rs. 1,00,000 from a bank at 10% per annum simple interest and clears the debt in five years. If the installment paid at the end of the first, second, third and fourth years to clear the debt are Rs. 10,000, Rs. 20,000, Rs. 30,000 and Rs. 40,000, respectively, what amount should be paid at the end of the fifth year to clear the debt?
The average of six numbers is 3.52. The average of two of them is 3.7, while the average of other two is 2.5. What is the average of the remaining two?

english.explanation: The total sum of six numbers is calculated as 6 × 3.52 = 21.12. The first two numbers sum to 2 × 3.7 = 7.4, and the next two sum to 2 × 2.5 = 5.0. Subtracting these sums (7.4 + 5.0 = 12.4) from the total gives 21.12 - 12.4 = 8.72 for the remaining two numbers. Their average is 8.72 ÷ 2 = 4.36.
key_concepts: Subtracting known quantities to find unknowns
समूहों का योग जोड़ना और घटाना

questions.original_question: A Microwave oven is sold in Hyderabad for Rs. M. A retailer, Elahi from Hyderabad went to Madras and bought it for 25% less (when compared to the price in Hyderabad). He spends Rs. 1,000 on transport to bring it from Madras to Hyderabad. He sold it in Hyderabad for Rs. M making a profit of 10%. Find the value of M (in Rs.).

english.explanation: Elahi buys the microwave for 25% less than M, so his cost price is 0.75M. Adding transport cost of ₹1,000, his total cost becomes 0.75M + 1,000. He sells it for M with a 10% profit: M = (0.75M + 1,000) * 1.10. Solving: M = 0.825M + 1,100 → 0.175M = 1,100 → M = 1,100 / 0.175 ≈ 6,285.7.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the underlined group of words.</strong></p>

<p>My uncle is someone&nbsp;<u>who loves good food and knows a lot about it</u>.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'who loves good food and knows a lot about it' refers to someone with a deep appreciation for food. 'Gourmet' specifically denotes a person who is an expert in food and drink, aligning with the description. 'Connoisseur' is broader and applies to any area of expertise, but 'Gourmet' is more precise for food-related expertise.

Anxiety is one of the most insicdious conditions affecting the mental health of an individual.
Anxiety is one of the most insidiouos conditions affecting the mental health of an individual.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct passive form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Uma told Susan to give up smoking.</p>

options.value: Susan was told to give up smoking by Uma.
Susan is told to give up smoking by Uma.
Susan has been told to give up smoking by Uma.
Susan had been told to give up smoking by Uma.

english.correct_answer: 1. Susan was told to give up smoking by Uma.
english.explanation: The passive voice requires the subject (Susan) to receive the action. 'Was told' is the correct past simple passive form, making this the most accurate rephrasing of the original sentence.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न विवरण उपलब्ध नहीं है। हमारे पास प्रश्न या विकल्पों का आकलन करने के लिए पर्याप्त जानकारी नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Renu said to her brother, &ldquo;You were watching the show without me.&rdquo;</p>

options.value: Renu told her brother that he had been watching the show without her.
Renu told her brother that he has been watching the show without her.
Renu told her brother that he had watched the show without her.
Renu told her brother that he were watching the show without her.

english.correct_answer: 1. Renu told her brother that he had been watching the show without her.
english.explanation: The reported speech requires the past perfect tense ('had been watching') to indicate an action completed before the main past action (told). Options 2 and 4 use incorrect tenses or pronouns.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न विवरण उपलब्ध नहीं है। हमारे पास प्रश्न या विकल्पों का आकलन करने के लिए पर्याप्त जानकारी नहीं है।

english.explanation: The phrase 'held upon' is grammatically incorrect. The correct preposition after 'held' would be 'for' (e.g., 'held for an hour'). 'Upon' does not fit here grammatically.
